title: Elevation Map of Badain Jaran Desert
description: Spread sand on an even surface so that the layer is perfectly flat. You might think that gravity should keep the layer even. But even a flat layer of sand is unstable because grain sizes differ and respond differently to the same breeze. A light wind can form ripples on a sand surface in just minutes. Over years, centuries, and millennia, winds can sculpt sand into incredibly complex shapes.
